name: TopDodging
description:
Save your the herd by guiding them through dangerous levels!

Current background music is by Steven O'Brien: https://soundcloud.com/steveno...

The game is work in progress prototype / vertical-slice that I'm making for my portfolio. 

What I'm planning to do:

  • Prototype new gameplay ideas to add more depth to the game
  • New types of obstacles and dangers
  • Start menu and options menu
  • More and improved sound effects
  • Add some foliage and clutter
  • Plan what to do with music
  • High scores and leaderboards
  • Maybe some storytelling if I can come up with a fitting story
  • Maybe experiment with procedural level generation (like in Spelunky and Dead Cells)

If you try the game I would appreciate honest feedback. Be as brutal as you want. I'm really interested in your experience.
